attributes.action: Make the BBC sack Jo Brand and stop having double standards!
attributes.background: Making jokes about throwing acid in peoples faces is not funny, is totally humiliating for the victims of acid attacks and almost incites people to do it.  The BBC should take a stand and sack this woman immediately!

rejection.details:
This would be the responsibility of the BBC, which is independent of the UK Government and Parliament.

In any case, we can't accept petitions that call for someone to be given or to lose their job.
